item.description:
I could be wrong but I don't think we've ventured out for Polish food yet with EDEMG. Many moons ago, I asked a coworker where I could find some good Polish grub. She called up 4 of her Polish friends and they all recommended Staropolska. I have eaten there once and can't wait to go back.
My grandmother used to make pierogies all the time and the ones at this restaurant were the closest I've ever had that tasted like hers.
I couldn't pronounce any of the names of the Polish beers but they were tasty too!


www.staropolska.net

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Pierogies and Potato Pancakes at Staropolska
